title: K-12 Course Strengthening Learning Autonomy Through Digital Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ICT (Information and Communication Technology) proficiency and language learning experience
context.additional_context: General public learners aim for self-directed language learning using digital tools. Applying real-life problem-solving scenarios in a simulation environment.

learning_goals: Learners can negotiate and utilize digital tools and language learning strategies in a VR simulation environment
Learners can autonomously collect, process language learning materials, and establish learning plans using ICT tools
Learners can apply digital literacy competencies to improve language proficiency and self-assess their learning process
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
